Summary: hovered close,got bigger, stood still vibrating, looked closer and it slowly got little smaller and disappeared
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Buena Park
There were no other sightings in Buena Park on or around October 15th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsmy mom who was walking out the door to get the wash into the dryer saw a small round light coming closer then getting bigger almost the size of the moon just a little smaller in the sky at 10:25pm. she said it came closer and looked like a big florescent light bulb vibrating and she felt like it saw her looking at her and slowly got a little smaller and then poof! disappeared. my mothers friend who lives in Anaheim saw this same object fly right past her at 8:48pm in the sky before my mom say it. this all happened tonight 10-15-2013
